about

Who even are you?

My name is Lyzi Diamond. Hi!

I live in Oakland, California, where I am also from. For more information on where I've been throughout my life, check out the history page.

Where do you work?

I'm currently a 2014 Fellow with Code for America working with the great city of Lexington, KY. I like to make maps and teach people about making maps.

What else do you like to do?

I like to ride bikes, play handbells, watch college football (Go Ducks!), race dragon boats, drink delicious beer and coffee, write creatively, go on hikes, and speak in public.

How can I get a hold of you?

I'm glad you asked! Besides carrier pigeon, you can get at me on the interwebs:

  • email: lyzidiamond[at]gmail[dot]com
  • twitter: @lyzidiamond
  • github: lyzidiamond

How did you make this website?

This site runs on GitHub using GitHub Pages and Jekyll. The template was lovingly hand-coded by Lyzi Diamond in Portland, Oregon during the summer of 2013.
